list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flowering plant's unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cut open the peppers and remove the seeds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cắt mở ớt và loại bỏ hạt giống

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: any of a number of stronger competitors in a sports tournament who have been assigned a specified position in an ordered list with the aim of ensuring that they do not play each other in the early rounds.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he knocked the top seed out of the championships
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta gõ hạt giống hàng đầu ra khỏi chức vô địch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small crystal introduced into a liquid to act as a nucleus for crystallization.
a small container for radioactive material placed in body tissue during radiotherapy.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the shoreline is seeded with a special grass
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bờ biển được gieo hạt với một loại cỏ đặc biệt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a plant) produce or drop seeds.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: mulches encourage many plants to seed freely
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mulches khuyến khích nhiều cây để gieo hạt tự do

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remove the seeds from (vegetables or fruit).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thân cây và hạt giống ớt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (a competitor) the status of seed in a tournament.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Jeff Tarango, seeded five, was defeated by fellow American Todd Witsken
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Jeff Tarango, gieo hạt năm, đã bị đánh bại bởi đồng nghiệp của Mỹ Todd Witsken
